1. First I read the Data that given train.csv and test.csv
2. Then I realize In Credit line utilization Column there is some Values which devided with dot (.) and also with comma (,) i replace all commas with dots.
3. Then I do Outlier Treatement for the data like the i realocate values that bigger than uppercap and lower then lowercap 
4. Then after checking data i got the information that there are lots of missing values in data set thats why i used Missing value imputer. i repleaced missing values with average for each colomun 
5. Then i created new variables with Weight of evidence. ewhyich woE first some variables  like "Credit line util" and "numbers of late loans 90+" created bin variables such as devided 4 part then created weight of evidences variables. I got 4 variables
6. First i treid linear regression i got 83.3 (on public LB)
7. Then I changed it to RandomForest then i played with hyperparameters manualy to see the result.
8. While working i have used also future importance for to see which values are more important 
9. Used Pipes Standart scaler etc.
10. for the Score i used accuracy then realize it is not right way then i switch to Roc aug score 
     arc = roc_auc_score(X_test.defaulted_on_loan, predict[:,1])
11. with the model i got from train data i used it for test data and created the 12. column for prediction 
12. Saved csv
